summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates and a preliminary assessment roll for the proposed improvement of Upland Terrace S. from 52nd Ave. S. to S. Juneau St. and certain other streets, avenues, drives or paths by constructing underground utility lines and a residential street lighting system by local improvement district procedures as contemplated by Resolution No. 25436, making an appropriation from the Light Fund for necessary expenses of the Engineering Department in connection therewith, and providing for reimbursement of the Light Fund if a local improvement district is formed.
